basic.description: This course examines issues in Ethics and Animals. Potential topics include animal rights, human consumption and other uses of non-human animals, the domestication of non-human animals.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Ethics and Animals

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 4 & reg in a PHIL MAJ or MIN Plan or (level 4 and reg in a ENVS Med plan or ENSC MAJ Plan or ENSC, EGPY, EBIO, ECHM, EGEO, ELSC or ETOX Spec. Plan) & (a min. GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).
